snippet.title: Osprey raises $22.2m
snippet.content: Osprey Medical has received commitments from investors to raise $22.2 million at $0.40 per CDI. The placement was over-subscribed. Osprey is also undertaking a fully underwritten, non-renounceable entitlement offer at the same price to raise $10.3 million. The funds raised from the placement and entitlement offer will be primarily used for expanding US sales force to increase coverage of the US with focus on geographies with a high share of AKI. Originally published as
